name: Airborne Asha
desc: In this competition, you must try your best to paint over <color=#FFE14BFF>your opponent's Graffiti Zone</color> or the <color=#FFE14BFF>Graffiti Zone that hasn't been painted over</color> with your own paint. You will emerge victorious if your paint covers a certain amount of the Graffiti Zone!

imgDesc.text:
In this competition, you must try your best to paint over
your opponent's Graffiti Zone or the
Graffiti Zone that hasn't been painted over with your own paint. You will emerge victorious if your paint covers a certain amount of the Graffiti Zone!

Balloons controlled by your opponent will throw Paint Bombs. When these explode, they will cover nearby Graffiti Zones in paint, handing your opponent an advantage.
However, if you use paintballs to
shoot the Paint Bombs before they explode, you can
cause them to prematurely explode and convert to your own color. Use this to your advantage and seize the upper hand!
